tool_description: This project created for serve api endpoints to encrypt and decrypt text via http request
title: secure-text-api

api_list.name: decrypt
api_list.description:
This endpoint will decrypt request body ciphertext by privatekey.
 It response **plaintext** as string.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: encrypt
api_list.description:
This endpoint will encrypt request body plaintext by publickey.
 It response **ciphertext** as string.
 Client can decrypt it by calling decrypt endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com/encrypt"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getKey
api_list.description:
This endpoint will generated publickey and privatekey.
It response **msgCode** as six character string.

Client can use this code to verify owner of key, 
when calling encrypt and decrypt endpoint.

*** After decrypt ciphertext this code will inactive, 
client need to call getKey again to get new code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com/getKey"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: decrypt
api_list.description:
This endpoint will decrypt request body ciphertext by privatekey.
 It response **plaintext** as string.
